attributes.action: Continued Care for World War 2 Veterans
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for the UK government to support World War 2 veterans and ensure that they are cared for and shown respect in their time of need after they have serving this country in its time of need.

This petition is asking for raised pensions for all World War 2 veterans along with above average living costs to be paid for by the government as a sign of respect and thanks to the men and woman who kept Britain safe nearly 70 years ago.
